itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 27, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, June 27, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, David Brancaccio, Katie Long, Jeff Tyler, Mitchell Hartman, Gigi Douban, Sarah McCammon, Mark Gregory, Diane Swonk and Stacey Vanek Smith
teaser: Europe moves to protect taxpayers when banks fail. After yesterday's Supreme Court decision, the same sex marriage ban in California, Prop 8, is effectively no more. So what's the future of referenda in the wake of the high court decision? And loans remain cheap for wealthy borrowers with good credit scores, but if you're poor or don't have great credit, it's a very different story.
description: Europe moves to protect taxpayers when banks fail. After yesterday's Supreme Court decision, the same sex marriage ban in California, Prop 8, is effectively no more. So what's the future of referenda in the wake of the high court decision? And loans remain cheap for wealthy borrowers with good credit scores, but if you're poor or don't have great credit, it's a very different story.
